item.title: ELI5: Kubernetes Custom Resources
item.description: In this article, I will be using the process of building a house as an example to explain how Kubernetes Custom Resources work. Imagine building a custom home, which is a highly detailed and laborious work, that you decided to just hire a home builder. The builder gives you a form to fill out details such as: how many rooms do you need and what size should they be?
